Health fraud scams waste money ...'}, {'url': 'https://consumer.ftc.gov/consumer-alerts/2021/11/how-spot-and-avoid-common-health-scams', 'content': "Know that the government wouldn't hide proven remedies from you. If an ad offers a treatment that the seller claims the government or pharmaceutical industry doesn't want you to know about, it's a scam. If you think you've spotted a health scam, tell your friends and family about it. Then tell the FTC at ReportFraud.ftc.gov."}, {'url': 'https://diatribe.org/dietary-supplement-companies-are-making-false-claims-fda-and-ftc-warns', 'content': 'The FDA and the FTC sent warning letters to 10 companies falsely claiming to sell dietary supplements that could cure, treat, mitigate, or prevent diabetes.
